sentences.english: Better place for them is inside an incinerator to put things straight.
sentences.chinese: 他們更好的去處是在焚屍爐裏面，這樣才能整頓局面。

sentences.english: And you can also find the crematorium with running overloaded.
sentences.chinese: 此外，你還可以看到整日超負荷運轉的焚屍爐。

sentences.english: They look at the remains of prisoners lying on the ground and see crematorium ovens.
sentences.chinese: 他們望着地上以前戰俘遺留下的殘骸並參觀了焚屍爐。
